metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1296 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: HashiCorp Nomad and Nomad Enterprise 1.4.0 up to 1.5.0 did not correctly enforce deny policies applied to a workloadâ€™s variables. Fixed in 1.4.6 and 1.5.1.

criterions.comment: nomad: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
